reviews.review_msg: "MMM HMMMM" If you've taken 340 with Stephen you know what to expect. Good lectures and clear notes.  The exams, however, are a nightmare. He'll ask a very simple and straightforward question, but expect a long detailed answer. I'm still not sure what to think of him... If you have a choice, I'd say to choose another class.

I only took this class because I loved his teaching style from KIN304. Quizzes and continuing concepts keep you informed and up to date. If you want to learn, this guy makes it easy to ace his classes. Can't wait to take KIN382!
